img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a creature in a snowy environment. The creature has large, curved horns and is positioned in an aggressive stance. The character appears to be on the ground, possibly having been knocked down. The interface displays various icons and gauges, indicating player abilities and health status. The text "Monk From the Sea" is visible, suggesting the name of the character or enemy. The setting is a snow-covered courtyard with traditional architecture in the background.
